Control Name: Communicates System Changes—System changes that affect responsibilities or the achievement of the entity's objectives are communicated in a timely manner.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates System Changes—System changes that affect responsibilities or the achievement of the entity's objectives are communicated in a timely manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.2 COSO Principle 14: The entity internally communicates information, including objectives and responsibilities for internal control, necessary to support the functioning of internal control.
